pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.utils

Class BookReminder

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.utils.BookReminder

  • @Component
 @EnableScheduling
public class BookReminder
extends Object
    Utility class used to managing reminders.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

      Constructs a BookReminder with the BookService, MessageService and UserService.

      Returns TRUE if the expected end date plus given number of hours is smaller then present time and bigger then present time minus 1 hour.

      Gets the list of all borrowed books and check if they should be returned in the next 6 hours.

                                    String bookTitle,
                                    int hourLimit,
                                    Date expectedEndDate)
        Creates and saves a Message with given parameters.
        Parameters:
        theUser - The User containing the recipient
        bookTitle - The String containing the title of the book
        hourLimit - The int containing the number of hours
        expectedEndDate - The Date containing the expected end date

      • isBorrowedBookExpired

        public boolean isBorrowedBookExpired(Date getExpectedEndDate,
                                     int hourLimit)
        Returns TRUE if the expected end date plus given number of hours is smaller then present time and bigger then present time minus 1 hour.
        Parameters:
        getExpectedEndDate - The Date containing the expected end date
        hourLimit - The int containing the number of hours
        Returns:
        A boolean representing the result

      • twentyFourHoursToReturnBookReminder

        @Scheduled(fixedRate=3600000L)
public void twentyFourHoursToReturnBookReminder()
        Gets the list of all borrowed books and check if they should be returned in the next 24 hours.

      • sixHoursToReturnBookReminder

        @Scheduled(fixedRate=3600000L)
public void sixHoursToReturnBookReminder()
        Gets the list of all borrowed books and check if they should be returned in the next 6 hours.

      • expiredBookReminder

        @Scheduled(fixedRate=86400000L)
public void expiredBookReminder()
        Gets the list of all borrowed books and check if they should be returned immediately.
